NASDAQ: LSCC -17
Giving Back Where We Work and Live
At Lattice, we are committed to 
our communities
§Volunteering and donations to 
Oregon Food Bank and Second 
Harvest Food Bank of Silicon 
Valley (US)
§Participating in the “Run with 
“Love” charity fundraiser (China)§Building playhouses with Habitat 
for Humanity for children of an 
active duty military member (US)
§Regular Red Cross blood 
donations (Philippines)
§Hosting an annual Albertina Kerr Giving Tree for disabled 
adults and children
§Driving donations to Bahay Aruga, a shelter for 
homeless minors
§Making COVID -19 PPE donations to frontline 
medical workers
§Tree planting in the local communityVOLUNTEERING
Global Community Service
